name: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania v. Granfort RODGERS, Appellant

judges: Before O’BRIEN, C. J., and ROBERTS, NIX, LARSEN, FLAHERTY and KAUFFMAN, JJ.
parties: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania v. Granfort RODGERS, Appellant.

opinions.text:
OPINION OF THE COURT
PER CURIAM:
The appeal is dismissed, 259 Pa. Super. 376, 393 A.2d 876, as being improvidently granted.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM:

attorneys: John W. Packel, Asst. Public Defender, Chief, Appeals Div., Jeffrey Staniels, Philadelphia, for appellant.
Robert B. Lawler, Chief, Appeals Div., Jane Greenspan, Philadelphia, for appellee.
casebody.head_matter:
425 A.2d 746
COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania v. Granfort RODGERS, Appellant.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Argued Jan. 26, 1981.
Decided Feb. 27, 1981.
John W. Packel, Asst. Public Defender, Chief, Appeals Div., Jeffrey Staniels, Philadelphia, for appellant.
Robert B. Lawler, Chief, Appeals Div., Jane Greenspan, Philadelphia, for appellee.
Before O’BRIEN, C. J., and ROBERTS, NIX, LARSEN, FLAHERTY and KAUFFMAN, JJ.
